${ModID}:GravityPower.NAME: Gravity
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a #yLocked or #yUnplayable card, draw 1 card.
Whenever you draw a #yLocked or #yUnplayable card, draw #b

${ModID}:DeepDreamPower.NAME: Deep Dream

Whenever you play a card this turn, make #b
